import React,{useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" const DetailCategory = ({category}) => { const { id } = useParams(); const cate = id ? cate.find(cate=>cate.id == id):{}; const [valueInput,setValueInput] = useState(cate); const { handleSubmit, register, errors } = useForm(); const onHandleChange = (e)=>{ const {name,value} = e.target; setValueInput({ ...valueInput, [name]:value }) } const history = useHistory(); const onHandleSubmit = data =>{ if(data){ } } return (
